title: Phanteks Focuses on AIRFLOW - P400A & Evolv SHIFT Air Case
description: With all the talk lately about case airflow, Phanteks has decided to launch some interesting additions to their gaming case lineup with the P400A and Evolv Shift Air.    Our thanks to Phanteks and Steelseries for sponsoring this trip to Computex 2019.  Without them, this coverage wouldn't have been possible.    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Phanteks. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #phanteksp400a #computex2019 #phanteks #hardwarecanucks
